EmailTemplate.subject: The easy way to fuel your business plus a limited time rebate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Our wheels are always turning, looking for ways to boost business owners. That’s why the Chevron and Texaco Business Card is the fueling solution that helps you control spending, skip paperwork, and maximize savings--all with no setup, monthly, or annual fees!
Special Limited-Time Offer:
Apply today and earn a 10c per gallon rebate for 12 months* at all Chevron and Texaco locations!
Keep your business moving
- Fuel at nearly 8,000 Chevron and Texaco stations in the U.S.
- Control and enforce purchasing policies with powerful online tools
- Uncover savings with advanced data capture and reporting
- Reduce paperwork with automatic accounting
- Fight fraud with Driver ID numbers and odometer at the pump
- Live support 24/7 with U.S.-based customer advisors
We help make fueling your business easier.
I will follow up next week with more information on our program, and look forward to learning about the unique needs of your business. In the meantime, you can always reach me at {!User.Phone} or via email at {!User.Email}.
Ready to apply? It only takes one call for extra savings on fuel costs!
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title}
Phone: {!User.Phone} Email: {!User.Email}
*Applications must be received by December 31, 2020. The 10¢ per gallon promotional rebate is based on your billing cycle and ends three months after the Chevron and Texaco Business Card account is issued. Rebate will begin from gallon one and apply to each gallon up to 500 gallons per monthly billing period purchased at Chevron and Texaco locations. Rebates will appear as an account credit on your billing statement. Rebates are subject to change at any time without prior notice. Not valid on aviation, bulk fuel, propane or natural gas purchases.
